column4: is there a console email client preinstalled with kubuntu edgy?
probably 'mail' though 'mutt' would be what I would recommend
just do  'sudo apt-get install mutt'
does mutt work with http proxies?
not sure, I use it for local spools and imaps
do you have any idea regarding beryl on kubuntu?
if your title bars disappear, it means the window manager has crashed
so what can i do to help that?
try restarting beryl again by clicking on the ruby and selecting beryl as the window manager or the reload window manager option
beryl is quite unstable, it works well on some of my systems and not so well on others
ultimately, you may need to just not run it until it develops further
tried that didnt work
what video card are you running?
it really only works well with ATi or Nvidia from what I've read
geforce4 4400 Go
k, not sure, it's just fairly buggy
running Edgy or Dapper?
yeah i was guessing that its not in great shape yet. I tried xgl earlier and it looked pretty cool on my old computer.
seems to be a bit better on my Edgy systems
but it's not exactly rock solid
im running kubuntu edgy
yeah, dunno what to tell you other than keep playing with it or give it up , I've done a bit of both on varying systems
but im considering switching back to ubuntu 6,06
